parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which you want to enable the SQL audit feature.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

parameters.name: IsRecall
parameters.description: Specifies whether to backtrack historical SQL statements for auditing.

parameters.name: RecallEndTimestamp
parameters.description:
The timestamp that indicates when the backtracking ends. Unit: milliseconds.

> The end time of the backtracking must be later than the start time of the backtracking.

parameters.name: RecallStartTimestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp that indicates when the backtracking starts. Unit: milliseconds.
